name: Plant-It Sell-It
description: An ecommerce app for the selling and buying of plant propagations.
role: My core responsibilities were the frontend, working on the responsiveness and layout of the shop pages as well as the detail page while collaborating with another developer on the color scheme.
technologies: React, Node, Express, CSS, MongoDB/Mongoose, Material UI, GraphQL, Amazon S3 Bucket, JSON Web Token

name: Welcome Neighbor!
description: Welcome Neighbor is a web application that allows Users to connect to people in their Neighborhood on a more intimate level in close proximity.
role: Developer of homepage, navbar, and SendGrid API functionality
technologies: MySQL/Sequelize, Handlebars, SendGrid API, Express, JavaScript, CSS, Bootstrap, SendGrid, Font Awesome, Node, BCrypt

name: Forecast with a Chance of Camping
description: Travel site for identifying national parks in the United States by zip code.
role: Sole developer of the weather dashboard, troubleshooting Rec APi, JavaScript for the site.
technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, API, Bulma, Moment.js

name: Weather-or-Not
description: An easy to use weather application for the user to see forecasts for searched cities and plan trips or events accordingly.
technologies: Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, OpenWeatherMap API

name: Scribe
description: This application is a simple note taker application for writing and saving notes via express.

name: Expense-Pal
description: PWA budget tracker application to manage expenses whether online or offline.
technologies: HTML, CSS, MongoDB/Mongoose, jQuery, IndexedDB, Express
